meanings.sent1: Her room was overneat, with everything in its proper place.
meanings.sent2: The overneat housekeeper made sure every surface sparkled.
meanings.sent3: The overneat cat insisted on grooming itself after every meal.
meanings.sent4: His overneat habits extended to color-coding his book collection.
meanings.sent5: The overneat garden was a sight to behold, with perfectly trimmed hedges and flower beds.

meanings.sent1: The overneat accountant double-checked every number in the report.

meanings.sent3: The overneat chef measured each ingredient with extreme care.
meanings.sent4: His overneat attention to detail ensured the project's success.
meanings.sent5: The overneat clockmaker crafted each gear with precision and skill.
